body.p: In its last issue before the holidays, this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter reiterates the Gentoo documentation project's call for feedback on a new bootstrapping guide in the making. The Gentoo Summer Camp organizers have a forum of their own, a Gentoo-based home media center and KDE dot news being hosted on a Gentoo server, some security announcements and the usual bugzilla statistics conclude this edition. Enjoy your GWN!
